meanings.definition: A style of beard named after the 17th-century Flemish painter Anthony van Dyck.
meanings.sent1: He decided to grow vandykes to give his face a more artistic look.
meanings.sent2: The barber specialized in shaping vandykes for his clients.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone admired his vandykes and thought he was dressed as a painter.
meanings.sent4: His vandykes were like tiny brushes painting his jawline with style.
meanings.sent5: The vandykes on his face made him resemble a historical figure.

meanings.definition: A type of decorative border or trim with a series of pointed projections.
meanings.sent1: The curtains were adorned with intricate vandykes that added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: She sewed delicate vandykes along the edges of the tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten kept trying to catch the vandykes hanging from the table.
meanings.sent4: The castle walls were embellished with vandykes that seemed to reach for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The vandykes on the dress hem created a striking and unique design.
